# Mailchimp Integration

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/help-articles/integrations/mailchimp-integration/

## Category
10 Email Marketing

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
APPS & INTEGRATIONS
MAILCHIMP INTEGRATION
Mailchimp Integration
Note: 

Mangomint's Campaigns and Flows apps are available to use instead of our Mailchimp integration. With campaigns and flows, you can send targeted marketing messages directly through Mangomint—no integration required.

Our Mailchimp integration syncs client details—including email address and phone number—from Mangomint to Mailchimp, allowing you to create and send campaigns using Mailchimp.

To learn more about our Mailchimp integration, watch our on-demand Mailchimp video.

Note: 

Mailchimp is an integration partner that has a separate monthly fee in addition to your Mangomint subscription. Before setting up the integration, please verify that your Mailchimp plan supports the number of clients in Mangomint.

In this section:
Setting Up the Mailchimp Integration
Sending Emails to Your Clients Using Mailchimp
Sending Emails to Clients with Memberships Using Mailchimp
Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
